    Crayon 

    cat(cli::col_red("This is red"), "\n")
#> This is red
cat(cli::col_blue("This is blue\n"), "\n")
#> This is blue
#> 

message(cli::col_green("This is green"))
#> This is green

warning(cli::style_bold("This is bold"))
#> Warning: This is bold
